Note the red dot in the figure, you can see that in the state D,$P_{D}=2atm$ and $V_{D}=20L$
Note the red dot in the figure, you can see that in the state A,$P_{A}=4atm$ and $V_{A}=10L$
According to the ideal gas equation of state $ rac{P_{A}V_{A}}{T_{A}}= rac{P_{D}V_{D}}{T_{D}}$, $T_{D}=300K$ can be obtained
